constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 3 (Tuesday, January 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHNEIDER:
H.R. 212.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H74]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: COVID PREPARE Act of 2021
